descriptionHtml:
FOR ARGONIAN PLAYTHROUGHS ONLY

This is my first mod :D and this mod will give you Zorra the Argonian ice mage he's at lvl 1 so he can level up and get strong as you do. he has 2 ice spells and healing. AND he's your brother :P that's why you kinda need to be an Argonian for this mod to even make sense :/ i know its a basic mod i know! X( but he works properly, is essential and he kicks ass so that's all good :D I recommend (Amazing follower tweaks) for best results. (You Can teach him new spells)

He can be found In front of the Sleeping Giant inn looking over the river

And if anyone has any tips or suggestions to make this mod better in some way let me know will ya! :D
And if there are any problems Let me know that to :/ i'll get right on it.
author: Swordsguy2010
